Room.Name: Rosecrest Street
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Rosecrest Street, just west of the Ministry of Truth building.
Room.LongDescription: The monumental building on the east side of the street is known throughout the city as the Oceancrest Ministry of Truth. The ministry verifies every fact it can, and tries to define life and death in a philosophic sense. Unfortunately, no one in the Ministry of Truth can figure out what their compatriots are talking about, and as a consequence they have decided that all things are both true and false at the same time. The result of this is that the Ministry of Truth is considering opening a Ministry of Untruth to balance the philosphy they seek to impose on the citizens.
